description: Monitor for unexpected processes interacting with authentication mechanisms and processes to access user credentials or enable otherwise unwarranted access to accounts. Analytic 1 - Unauthorized process interactions with authentication mechanisms. ( index=your_index source="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4688 | where (New_Process_Name IN ("C:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe", "C:\\Windows\\System32\\winlogon.exe")) AND (Parent_Process_Name != "C:\\Windows\\System32\\services.exe") | stats count by New_Process_Name, Parent_Process_Name, Account_Name, ComputerName) OR (index=your_index sourcetype=linux_auditd | where file IN ("/etc/pam.d/", "/etc/passwd", "/etc/shadow") | stats count by file, user, host )
